body.raw:
vektr curator is an ai system that ingests a wide range of crypto rss feeds, tracks breaking items, and renders them as a headline + tight tldr with a link back to the source.

each story is treated as a vector. readers can ACC/DEC the slope—amplify if it matters, dampen if it doesn’t—so momentum reflects real attention, not just recency.

mission: fast, accurate, and transparent coverage that surfaces signal over noise while crediting original reporting.

sources are monitored for reliability and freshness; summaries aim for clarity over hype.

document.title: Ethereum onchain volume tops $320 billion in August, highest since mid-2021
document.summary: In August, Ethereum saw a significant spike in onchain volume, surpassing $320 billion. This surge was driven by increased institutional interest and low transa

body.raw:
![Ethereum onchain volume tops $320 billion in August, highest since mid-2021](https://www.tbstat.com/wp/uploads/2020/04/20200423_Ethereum_Stateless-1x-Daily-800x450.jpg)

In August, Ethereum saw a significant spike in onchain volume, surpassing $320 billion. This surge was driven by increased institutional interest and low transaction fees. This marks Ethereum's highest monthly volume since 2021.

document.title: Tether leads as crypto borrowing soars to $44 billion in record quarter
document.summary: Crypto borrowing surged in Q2 2025, hitting a record $26.47 billion backed by digital assets on DeFi platforms. Galaxy Research revealed a 42.1% increase from t

body.raw:
![Tether leads as crypto borrowing soars to $44 billion in record quarter](https://cryptoslate.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/tether-loan.jpg)

Crypto borrowing surged in Q2 2025, hitting a record $26.47 billion backed by digital assets on DeFi platforms. Galaxy Research revealed a 42.1% increase from the previous quarter. This trend highlights the growing popularity of leveraging crypto holdings for loans in the market.

document.title: Bunni DEX paused following $2.4M exploit of liquidity function
document.summary: An exploit in Bunni's liquidity system led to a $2.4 million loss in stablecoins. To prevent further losses, the platform has temporarily halted all contracts.

body.raw:
![ Bunni DEX paused following $2.4M exploit of liquidity function ](https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/528_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjUtMDEvMDE5NDZlMzUtZDkzZC03MzYxLTg2YjctMDMyZWNiNGEzZTFk.jpg)

An exploit in Bunni's liquidity system led to a $2.4 million loss in stablecoins. To prevent further losses, the platform has temporarily halted all contracts. Stay updated for more details on this developing situation. #crypto #security

---

**Original Article:** [Cointelegraph.com News](https://cointelegraph.com/news/bunni-hack-2-4m-stablecoin-exploit-uniswap-v4?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound)

![ ETH staking entry queue surges to two-year high as institutions accumulate ](https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/528_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjUtMDIvMDE5NGMxZjgtZDYxZS03NWNlLWIxODMtZWQ4NjY4MGRmNWRl.jpg)

document.title: Bitcoin Flashes Rare Buy Signal Not Seen Since $49,000 And $74,000 Bottoms
document.summary: On-chain analyst Frank spotted a “buy” signal for Bitcoin, indicating potential price increases. This signal has historically led to significant swing lows at $

body.raw:
![Bitcoin Flashes Rare Buy Signal Not Seen Since $49,000 And $74,000 Bottoms](https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/ChatGPT-Image-Jun-27-2025-08_11_24-AM.png?fit=750%2C500)

On-chain analyst Frank spotted a “buy” signal for Bitcoin, indicating potential price increases. This signal has historically led to significant swing lows at $49,000 and $74,000. Frank noted an Oversold print on the short-term holder MVRV bollinger bands, suggesting a bullish trend.

---

**Original Article:** [NewsBTC](https://www.newsbtc.com/bitcoin-news/bitcoin-buy-signal-not-since-49000-74000-bottoms/)

document.title: Wall Street Giants Poised to Offer Spot Bitcoin and Ethereum Trading
document.summary: US regulators greenlight Wall Street giants to host Bitcoin and Ethereum trading.

body.raw:
![Wall Street Giants Poised to Offer Spot Bitcoin and Ethereum Trading](https://beincrypto.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/bic_crypto_market_general_5-covers.jpg)

US regulators greenlight Wall Street giants to host Bitcoin and Ethereum trading.
